name: Illegal Activity
description:
This is a simple parkour game, easy as pie. You must not do any illegal activity by only jumping when on a platform. I had to make my own "physics engine" for the gravity and it's pretty broken with how i setup collisions, code is messy overall. Made for PROCJAM2022

My wifi is slow at the time of uploading this so windows, macos and linux build will come later in a few hours

Illegal Activity | Play on Liluo.io
